${ModID}:BlazingSpark.NAME: Blazing Spark
${ModID}:BlazingSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:TreasureClaw.NAME: Treasure Claw
${ModID}:TreasureClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a random ${ModID}:Gem into your deck.
${ModID}:TreasureClaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a random ${ModID}:Gem+ into your deck.

${ModID}:Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
${ModID}:Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:StrikeGold.NAME: Strike Gold
${ModID}:StrikeGold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a random ${ModID}:Gem and the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:StrikeGold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a random ${ModID}:Gem+ and the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SaltTheWound.NAME: Salt The Wound
${ModID}:SaltTheWound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has ${ModID}:Cauterize, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage again. NL If not, apply !M! ${ModID}:Cauterize.

${ModID}:ScorchingFang.NAME: Scorching Fang
${ModID}:ScorchingFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Cauterize affects this card !M! times. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Cauterize.

${ModID}:GreedyStrike.NAME: Greedy Strike
${ModID}:GreedyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Hoard a random card.

${ModID}:Outscale.NAME: Outscale
${ModID}:Outscale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase the Block of ALL Outscale cards by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:LetThemCome.NAME: Let Them Come!
${ModID}:LetThemCome.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Pride for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:BlazingScales.NAME: Blazing Scales
${ModID}:BlazingScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back, increased by ${ModID}:Cauterize.

${ModID}:TreasureScale.NAME: Treasure Scale
${ModID}:TreasureScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a random ${ModID}:Gem into your deck.
${ModID}:TreasureScale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a random ${ModID}:Gem+ into your deck.

${ModID}:MassiveClaw.NAME: Massive Claw
${ModID}:MassiveClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your deck size, increased by !M! by each point of your ${ModID}:Pride.
${ModID}:MassiveClaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your deck size, increased by !M! by each point of your ${ModID}:Pride

${ModID}:MassiveScale.NAME: Massive Scale
${ModID}:MassiveScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your deck size, increased by your Pride.
${ModID}:MassiveScale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your deck size, increased by your Pride +3.

${ModID}:ProfaneSpark.NAME: Profane Spark
${ModID}:ProfaneSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:ProfaneSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak.  NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:ToxicSpark.NAME: Toxic Spark
${ModID}:ToxicSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:ToxicSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:SwiftSpark.NAME: Swift Spark
${ModID}:SwiftSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card.
${ModID}:SwiftSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:BarrageSpark.NAME: Barrage Spark
${ModID}:BarrageSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:BarrageSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:PureSpark.NAME: Pure Spark
${ModID}:PureSpark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Pride. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:PureSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Pride. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Pride. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:RadiantSpark.NAME: Radiant Spark
${ModID}:RadiantSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:RadiantSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E]. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.
Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:FocusedSpark.NAME: Focused Spark
${ModID}:FocusedSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each enemy in combat. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to deal increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:CrystallineSpark.NAME: Crystalline Spark
${ModID}:CrystallineSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.
${ModID}:CrystallineSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:SearingSwipe.NAME: Searing Swipe
${ModID}:SearingSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PridefulClaw.NAME: Prideful Claw
${ModID}:PridefulClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every Rare card in your deck. Deals !${ModID}:m2! additional damage for each ${ModID}:Pride you have.

${ModID}:Armorfryer.NAME: Armorfryer
${ModID}:Armorfryer.DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TreasureMind.NAME: Treasure Mind
${ModID}:TreasureMind.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Gem into your deck. NL Draw !M! cards.
${ModID}:TreasureMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Gems+ into your deck. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:VolcanicHoard.NAME: Volcanic Hoard
${ModID}:VolcanicHoard.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Hoard any number of cards in your hand. NL For each card ${ModID}:Hoarded, gain an additional !M! ${ModID}:Pride and apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ScourTheTrove.NAME: Scour The Trove
${ModID}:ScourTheTrove.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw 2 less cards next turn.
${ModID}:ScourTheTrove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw 2 less cards next turn. NL Shed !${ModID}:m2!.

${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Pride. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Hoard !${ModID}:m2! cards.

${ModID}:Sear.NAME: Sear
${ModID}:Sear.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TerrifyingRoar.NAME: Terrifying Roar
${ModID}:TerrifyingRoar.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TerrifyingRoar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TakeFlight.NAME: Take Flight
${ModID}:TakeFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Buffer at the start of your next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am already Taking Flight, so I cannot Take Flight.
I am In Flight, so I cannot Take Flight.

${ModID}:CrashLanding.NAME: Crash Landing
${ModID}:CrashLanding.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. At the end of your turn, ALL characters take !D! damage.

${ModID}:PridefulScale.NAME: Prideful Scale
${ModID}:PridefulScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for every Rare card in your deck. Gain !${ModID}:m2! additional Block for each ${ModID}:Pride you have.

${ModID}:Kindle.NAME: Kindle
${ModID}:Kindle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:DraconicWrath.NAME: Draconic Wrath
${ModID}:DraconicWrath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Rage and !M! Flame Barrier for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:HoardingInstinct.NAME: Hoarding Instinct
${ModID}:HoardingInstinct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random ${ModID}:Gem into your hand.

${ModID}:MoreMoreMore.NAME: More. More! More!!
${ModID}:MoreMoreMore.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a ${ModID}:Gem, draw !M! card.
${ModID}:MoreMoreMore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a ${ModID}:Gem, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:MonstrousGreed.NAME: Monstrous Greed
${ModID}:MonstrousGreed.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Hoard a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:CauterizingSpark.NAME: Cauterizing Spark
${ModID}:CauterizingSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Cauterize. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember.
${ModID}:CauterizingSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Cauterize. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase both effects by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember.

${ModID}:GreedFeed.NAME: Greed Feed
${ModID}:GreedFeed.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. Costs 1 more Energy each time you play this card this combat. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!.

${ModID}:Conflagration.NAME: Conflagration
${ModID}:Conflagration.DESCRIPTION: Gain X ${ModID}:Ember. NL Apply X ${ModID}:Cauterize. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Conflagration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 ${ModID}:Ember. NL Apply X+1 ${ModID}:Cauterize. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RoaringTemper.NAME: Roaring Temper
${ModID}:RoaringTemper.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Spark into your hand for each card discarded.
${ModID}:RoaringTemper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Spark+ into your hand for each card discarded.

${ModID}:FrightfulPresence.NAME: Frightful Presence
${ModID}:FrightfulPresence.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrightfulPresence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LegendaryResistance.NAME: Legendary Resistance
${ModID}:LegendaryResistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TradeOffer.NAME: Trade Offer
${ModID}:TradeOffer.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from draw or discard pile into your hand. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem where it was. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TradeOffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a card from draw or discard pile into your hand. NL Add a random ${ModID}:Gem+ where it was. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
${ModID}:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Play all Spark cards in your Hand, Draw Pile, and Discard Pile and Exhaust them. NL Then, add Infernal Breath into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Inferno.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play all Spark cards in your Hand, Draw Pile, and Discard Pile and Exhaust them. NL Then, add Infernal Breath+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All my Sparks are Breaths because I have too much Ember.

${ModID}:InfernalBreath.NAME: Infernal Breath
${ModID}:InfernalBreath.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consumes all ${ModID}:Ember to increase damage by !M! per ${ModID}:Ember. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ComfyNest.NAME: Comfy Nest
${ModID}:ComfyNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:ComfyNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Ember. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:DesertNest.NAME: Desert Nest
${ModID}:DesertNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Strength at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:DesertNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! temporary Strength. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Strength at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:ImposingNest.NAME: Imposing Nest
${ModID}:ImposingNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
${ModID}:ImposingNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

${ModID}:ExtravagantNest.NAME: Extravagant Nest
${ModID}:ExtravagantNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Pride.
${ModID}:ExtravagantNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Pride. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Pride.

${ModID}:ForestNest.NAME: Forest Nest
${ModID}:ForestNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Dexterity at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:ForestNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! temporary Dexterity. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary Dexterity at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:OceanNest.NAME: Ocean Nest
${ModID}:OceanNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, draw !M! card at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:OceanNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, draw !M! card at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:TundraNest.NAME: Tundra Nest
${ModID}:TundraNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Block at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:TundraNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Block at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:AbyssNest.NAME: Abyss Nest
${ModID}:AbyssNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Metallicize at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:AbyssNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Metallicize. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Metallicize at the start of your next turn for each [E].

${ModID}:AncientNest.NAME: Ancient Nest
${ModID}:AncientNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Artifact at the start of your next turn for each [E].
${ModID}:AncientNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact. NL Whenever you have [E] at the end of your turn, gain !M! Artifact at the start of your next turn. for each [E]

${ModID}:MoltingNest.NAME: Molting Nest
${ModID}:MoltingNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Shed !M!.
${ModID}:MoltingNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Shed !${ModID}:m2!. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, ${ModID}:Shed !M!.

${ModID}:HeavenlyNest.NAME: Heavenly Nest
${ModID}:HeavenlyNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, add !M! Miracle into your hand at the start of your next turn.
${ModID}:HeavenlyNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !${ModID}:m2! Miracle into your hand. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, add !M! Miracle into your hand at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:VolcanicNest.NAME: Volcanic Nest
${ModID}:VolcanicNest.DESCRIPTION: If you have [E] at the end of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:VolcanicNest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies. NL If you have [E] at the end of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Cauterize to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:NestingForm.NAME: Nesting Form
${ModID}:NestingForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random ${ModID}:Nest into your hand.

${ModID}:Aquamarine.NAME: Aquamarine
${ModID}:Aquamarine.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Emerald.NAME: Emerald
${ModID}:Emerald.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Diamond.NAME: Diamond
${ModID}:Diamond.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Pride. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Rhodonite.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Ember. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Ruby.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Amethyst.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Garnet.NAME: Garnet
${ModID}:Garnet.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Quartz.NAME: Quartz
${ModID}:Quartz.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.
${ModID}:Quartz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:Citrine.NAME: Citrine
${ModID}:Citrine.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E]. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.
${ModID}:Citrine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E][E]. NL ${ModID}:Hoard this card.

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
